column3: “This has been a godsend for my fibromyalgia pain. No head high, all body. Lovely.”

“TJ's set me up with whole flower medicines in capsule and flower.  Breathtakingly fragrant and gorgeous buds in several varieties, all varieties with great flavor.  I use cannabis for relief from chronic intractable pain, fibromyalgia, ptsd and peripheral neuropathy.  TJ.s Purple Kush helped me with pain, relaxation and sleep; the TJ.s Matanuska Thunder is great for daytime get up and go to help convince my aging fra...”

“A CBD strain I believe is a must for me MO Matter what indica or sativa strain I use. I always have a CBD around to compliment or cut the effects of a strain. TJ 14% CBD 0%THC strain is my favorite some CBD strains have high to mid THC strains which I dislike but will tolerate.”
“Really helps with arthritis without getting into your head. I felt completely functional on it.”

“If you are looking for a head high this isn't for you. If you are looking for something to help with pain then try this. The batch I got was a little low but I just had to smoke a little more to take the pain away. Able to keep a straight head though which was nice.”
“this skin cancer fighting cannabis is the NJ umber one biological begining. good luck finding me. :) 😘😘”

“I love this one. It gives me a nice body high, but it doesn't last long for me. It is my sister in laws weed, but she said I could have some. I think I want to buy my own, because I just might smoke all of hers. ♡♡♡”
“love this strain. It really helped me write this review, minus the spicy boners”

“I can't handle much THC, it makes me really sick to my stomach. This strain is low enough in THC that I can smoke as needed for my pain and it really does help. A serious godsend for my chronic illnesses. THANK YOU SO MUCH!”
“Top flight daytime choice for body pain relief while remaking on task and focused. I can't wait to try this one again. A true multi purpose strain if I ever saw one.”

“A great addition to any medical marijuana patients medication rotation. This is a great strain for morning or afternoon pick me up's plus it's got that added pain relief that'll calm your aches and pains also great for PTSD patients. A couple sessions in a bong or joint maybe an a vape would do you just fine. I would totally recommend this strain if you see it in a dispensary grab it.”
“just right. eases the aches and pains of an aging body, while remaining clear headed. tastes clean and floral.”
“Consumed in hot cocoa.  This strain does well.”
“Wanted to like it, but hated it.  No effect on me whatsoever.”

“This strain was not what I had anticipated If it was I think I would have given it a four out of five, only because of the body High.

If your expecting any head high its not there
Although you may feel like your spot on, I noticed I tended to spout gibberish at my hubby that he just told me i was a little far gone! But somehow I still felt like I was fully functional. 

I struggle with many sever pains in my body my...”
“works for relaxation and taking the edge off stress. I've been getting mild headaches from it tho”
